component.name: extractBedweight
component.doc: This component extracts bedweight format from the mappings in the FMI repository (.ral format). Call sequencce: extractBed_anduril.py calls /GROUP/DeepSeqPipeline.Piotr/soft/extractData.pl and pipes to /GROUP/DeepSeqPipeline.Piotr/soft.bc2/frag2bedweight.pl . The resulting bedweight file is a bed file with weighted reads (number of identical reads/number of mappings).

output.name: out_dir
output.doc: Where to write the output to.

parameter.name: FMIid
parameter.doc: ID for FMI repository. This is the name of the input file without fastq and gz extensions.

parameter.name: FMIpath
parameter.doc: Path to the FMI pipeline directory. Contains soft and samples directory.

parameter.name: perlPATH
parameter.doc: Path to perl that should be used for execution.

parameter.name: FMI_output_dir
parameter.doc: Directory where FMI output is written to. It is used like the 'samples' directory of the FMI toolkit. I added this because I don't want to store all data in the standard samples repository.
